rationale: Assessed as Vulnerable due to an inferred population decline of greater than 30% over the past ten years.  This is due to a decline in habitat quality and an increase in water pollution, in the São Francisco River basin. Also because the majority of its congeners are similarly threatened as well.
evaluator: Collen, B., Darwall, W., Ram, M. & Smith, K. (SRLI Freshwater Fish Evaluation Workshop)
